AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: plantation owner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't particularly good at working the fields, [PAWN_pronoun] was good at delegating work to others. Thanks to this gift, [PAWN_nameDef] eventually wound up owning the plantation [PAWN_pronoun] worked at, and promptly outlawed the use of slaves.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rancher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent much of [PAWN_possessive] early life working at the family ranch. It was home to all sorts of animals, from pigs to chickens, and sometimes something a little stranger.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: kwama egg miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While kwama nests are a rare sight outside of Morrowind, [PAWN_nameDef] found work in [PAWN_possessive] early years at one not too far from home.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: iron miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] toiled away at the local iron mine for much of [PAWN_possessive] early life. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] misses the claustrophobic tunnels, but not for very long.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: silver miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] found work at a silver mine a few towns over. While the miners that worked there may have been kept under a watchful eye, [PAWN_nameDef] did manage to convince a few guards to turn a blind eye, and to just ignore the raw silver that seemed to make its way into [PAWN_possessive] pockets.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: skooma seller
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had the brilliant idea of starting [PAWN_possessive] own skooma business, a bustling market with profit margins most could only dream of. After a run in with the local criminal organisation, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to sample [PAWN_possessive] own product, leaving the past few years a blur.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rat trainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: One day [PAWN_nameDef] woke up and decided that [PAWN_pronoun] would train pack rats. Over [PAWN_possessive] years working in this emerging industry, [PAWN_pronoun] made a surprising amount of gold. Turns out rats are rather easy to train, and even easier to breed. And when times were tough, [PAWN_nameDef] always had something to eat.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: steel smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master of steel, and made a small fortune selling steel armaments. [PAWN_possessive] blades adorned the hips of many nobles.\n\nOf course this all came to an end when a competitor emerged. This may not have been a problem for [PAWN_nameDef], except that [PAWN_possessive] competitor forged Akaviri style blades. Soon [PAWN_nameDef] was left with nothing more than crippling debt.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slaughterfish eradicator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a group tasked with clearing the local waterways of slaughterfish. Many slaughterfish were slain, and many members of the group were lost to their ravenous jaws. Luckily [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't terrible with a bow, and subsequently came out reasonably unscathed.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slaughterfish eradicator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of a group tasked with clearing the local waterways of slaughterfish. Many slaughterfish were slain, and many members of the group were lost to their ravenous jaws. But [PAWN_nameDef] managed to survive the ordeal, albeit missing a leg.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: arena fighter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] frequently visited the local arena. In fact [PAWN_pronoun] spent many hours a day fighting in the pit, so many in fact that [PAWN_pronoun] had accrued quite the fanbase. Sadly all the blows to [PAWN_possessive] head has left a lasting impact.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: alchemist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always willing to do anything to advance [PAWN_possessive] alchemical knowledge, even if it meant consuming somewhat... unconventional items. At the end of the day any pain [PAWN_nameDef] suffered was worth it, as the pouches of coin that accompanied fulfilled orders were quite heavy.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: alchemist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always willing to do anything to advance [PAWN_possessive] alchemical knowledge, even if it meant consuming somewhat... unconventional items. This willingness ended very abruptly one fateful day, when [PAWN_nameDef] bit down on a piece of Dwemer scrap metal.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gardener
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with caring for a nobles flower garden... after the previous gardener mysteriously disappeared. It was hard work, but well worth it, as at the end of the day [PAWN_nameDef] got to wander around admiring all the exotic flowers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: possessed
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] claims to be possessed by a vengeful spirit. This likely occurred during one of [PAWN_objective] frequent excursions to pilfer ancient tombs, but [PAWN_nameDef] will never admit that.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: mercenary
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was quite knowledgeable when it came to the dangers of the local lands, and knew how to deal with almost all of them. From bandits to manhunter animals, if you needed protection while out in the wilds, [PAWN_nameDef] was who you wanted to hire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: drunkard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] claims to be a veteran of some war way back in the olden days. No one really believes [PAWN_objective], mostly because the story seems to change every single time. But occasionally someone takes pity and gives [PAWN_objective] a few coins, which are promptly spent on more alcohol.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: temple healer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Many came to the local temple when seeking aid, many were in need of healing, and [PAWN_nameDef] would attempt to help them all. Some would require elixirs, some a bowl of warm soup, and others simply kind words.
